Body:
rs = np.random.RandomState(_SEED)
specs = {k: v for k, v in particles_specs.items() if k in ['num_particles',
    'D', 'box']}
P = pbm.Particles.from_specs(**specs, rs=rs)
S = pbm.ParticlesSimulation(t_step=t_step, t_max=t_max, particles=P, box=
    box, psf=psf)
S.simulate_diffusion(save_pos=True, total_emission=False, radial=False, rs=rs)
S.store.close()
return S.hash()[:6]
